fullText:
Draconic Reaping

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Revenant, dragonborn, dragon breath racial power
Benefit: Choose a damage type available in the dragon breath dragonborn racial power. Your dark reaping racial power and dragon breath racial power deal that damage type and necrotic damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376, page(s) 39.
name: Draconic Reaping
